rooms.name: Hospital Lobby
rooms.description: You are in the bright hospital lobby. A reception desk stands before you.

rooms.name: Ward
rooms.description: Rows of patient beds line the ward. You hear the quiet beeping of monitors.

rooms.name: ICU
rooms.description: You step into the Intensive Care Unit. The air feels tense and quiet.

rooms.name: Cafeteria
rooms.description: The cafeteria smells faintly of coffee and disinfectant.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: A cramped room filled with cleaning supplies and boxes.

rooms.name: Emergency Room
rooms.description: Doctors rush around treating patients. It's loud and chaotic.

rooms.name: Surgery Room
rooms.description: A sterile operating theater with bright lights overhead.

rooms.name: Hospital Hallway
rooms.description: A long corridor with patient charts pinned on the walls.

rooms.name: Pharmacy
rooms.description: Shelves of medicine line the walls.

rooms.name: Stairwell
rooms.description: A narrow stairwell that connects to the rooftop.

rooms.name: Rooftop
rooms.description: You can see the entire city from up here.

rooms.name: School Entrance
rooms.description: You are at the entrance of the school. A large notice board greets you.

rooms.name: Classroom
rooms.description: Rows of desks face a whiteboard filled with equations.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet and dusty. Shelves of books stretch to the ceiling.

rooms.name: Principal's Office
rooms.description: A tidy office with certificates on the wall.

rooms.name: School Hallway
rooms.description: Lockers line the walls. The sound of chatter echoes faintly.

rooms.name: Science Lab
rooms.description: You smell chemicals and see flasks bubbling on burners.

rooms.name: Cafeteria
rooms.description: Students sit chatting over trays of food.

rooms.name: Gymnasium
rooms.description: You hear the echo of bouncing balls. A basketball hoop stands at each end.

rooms.name: Central Square
rooms.description: A bustling plaza with fountains and shops around.

rooms.name: Dark Alley
rooms.description: A narrow alleyway between two tall buildings.

rooms.name: Abandoned Warehouse
rooms.description: Dust and old crates fill this forgotten place.

rooms.name: Metro Station
rooms.description: The hum of trains echoes through the tunnels.

rooms.name: Underground Tunnel
rooms.description: A damp tunnel stretching far under the city.

rooms.name: Old Bunker
rooms.description: A relic from the past, filled with metal shelves and flickering lights.

rooms.name: City Park
rooms.description: Trees sway gently as people walk their dogs.

rooms.name: Old Bridge
rooms.description: The bridge crosses a slow-moving river, offering a view of the skyline.

rooms.name: Suburbs
rooms.description: A quiet residential area with rows of identical houses.

rooms.name: Bus Stop
rooms.description: A small bus shelter. Timetables are posted on the wall.
